remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2012.)
statement:
cdleme0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme0.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme0.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme0.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdlemeulpq $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A ) ) -> U .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) $.
